EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Evan, Thank you for reaching out! I would be happy to speak with you and give you some background on MBO Partners and how we help independent consultants. If you could please click on the link to my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcFRQoU907u6LO%2Fu8vzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and select a time to speak that works best for your schedule I will follow up with you then. Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you!Nicolette From: Evan Faber [mailto:evan.faber@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, February 01, 2013 3:07 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: referred by Evan Michelson Dear Nicolette -I hope this finds you well. Evan Michelson suggested we get in touch about a contract for a project he and I have been discussing. Looking forward to connecting with you soon.Best,Evan -- Evan Faberc: 917-903-0728
